name: Kirby Does His Taxes
description:
Kirby Does His Taxes is a non-profit fan-game originally mentioned as a joke on reddit. The game follows Kirby as he collects taxpapers and money on a quest to stop the evil forces of Capitalism, Socialism, Communism, and Fascism as they take over Dream Land one by one. Kirby Does His Taxes also features music by popular youtube channel SilvaGunner. *CONTROLS BELOW*

#fangame #action #adventure #platformer #retro #other #puzzle
